reviews.review: The game play may be a throw back to a time before modern shooter mechanics like cover were a thing, but the story line is great. If your a parent, set the game to easiest difficulty and play it thru once for the story, all the feels if you have kids.

Che dire di un gioco simile, che non è un gioco ma un libro in cui immergersi e bere ogni giocata come le pagine di un libro pieno di colpi di scena. Ottima la grafica, personaggi caratterizzati in modo impeccabile, unico nel suo genere
Beautiful universe and mindblowing plot. I like that the world is less creepy than the previous Bioshock games.

Selten hat sich ein Spiel wegen seiner Geschichte und der Plot-Wendungen in mein Gehirn gebrannt wie Bioshock Infinite. Mehrere Male fügen sich im letzten Drittel die Puzzleteile im Kopf des Spielers zusammen und lassen die Kinnlade förmlich runterfallen. Wer viel Wert auf die Handlung legt, wird hier nicht enttäuscht.
Auch atmosphärisch ist Bioshock Infinite sehr stark und entwickelt mit seiner detailierten Grafik und den lebendigen Leveldesign eine kleine eigene Welt, in welche man sich einlebt.
Diese Stärken lassen die zu vielen Kämpfe verschmerzen, die mit der Zeit zu einfach werden und dann als Hindernis zwischen dem nächsten Storyteil gesehen werden. Die Schießereien machen Laune und oft kann man durch verschiedene Wege den Gegner cool austricksen. Aber man hat schnell die Kniffe raus und dann ist Infinite bis zum Ende keine Herausforderung mehr. Trotzdem ist die Spielerfahrung sehr positiv.
Игра старой школы, отличный сюжет, антураж и повествование!!!

Trama pazzesca. Sono rimasto incollato allo schermo fino alla fine del gioco, ed una volta finito... WOW, e ripeto: WOW.
Sono rimasto davanti allo schermo per circa 20 minuti, realizzando nel mentre quello che è successo negli ultimi 10 minuti di gioco. 
Niente da dire, trama 10/10, il gameplay poteva essere migliorato ma la trama ha risolto il problema.
Colonna sonora con i fiocchi e personaggi caratterizzati alla perfezione ( parlo di Elizabeth, Booker, Comstock e .... *coff coff* i due Lutece.

Bioshock Infinty, um jogo simplesmente fantástico, na minha opinião, uma inovação bioshock, pois não leva a uma cidade submarina, e sim uma cidade acima das nuvens, a história muito emocionante, o que levou a minha indicação ao prêmio da steam, do ''entrou um cisco no meu olho'', realmente um belo enredo, e personagens de se apaixonar.

Enredo meio logico, mas bom,  por conta do Final Chocante e inesperado!

This is honestly one of the best games I've ever played. Amazing atmosphere, an incredible story and well-written caracters that will stuck in your mind for a long time. The controls flow good and the gameplay is good to say the least.
Overall, if you like a story that will leave you hooked, this is a game for you. If you only care about shooting stuff and kill all of the enemies, I wouldn't reccomentd it because this game is really dependent on his story

This is one of the few games I've almost played through in one session. It's quite different from the previous entries in the series and while some might dislike that, I personally think it's the best of them. It's more colourful and "upbeat" than it's predecessors, but that is exactly why I loved it. The other two games tell a story about a fallen society, while in Bioshock Infinite you get to live in one of the utopian cities.. for a while.. The pace of action is fast and grips you in from the start. Some of the characters could've been a bit more fleshed out but overall the story is very well written. 
 
 
If you haven't played it yet play it now!

Атмосфера этй игры навсегда запомнится каждому игроку, который хоть раз видел Элизабет и по достоинтсву оценил ее качества. В игре идеально все: начиная от сюжета и заканчивая геймплеем и графикой. Концовка заставит задуматься многих и перепройти эту игру еще множество раз. Дополнения так же погружают игрока в этот удивительный мир, который тесно связан с подводным Восторгом из предыдущих частой  и летающей Колумбии, и помогает увидеть главных персонажей в новом ракурсе

Bioshock Infinite, besides being what the sequel to the stellar Bioshock really looks like, is a game with enough thought to its story and fun to its gameplay that it deserves a play from anyone who considers themselves a gamer. Another masterpiece from Irrational Games, one that will live long in the halls of gaming history and the minds of those who play it. Do yourself a favor: pick this up and enjoy the ride.
